org.apache.gora.filter

Interface Filter<K,T extends Persistent>

  • Type Parameters:
    K -
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilterList, MapFieldValueFilter, SingleFieldValueFilter

    public interface Filter<K,T extends Persistent>
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Defines filtering (possibly including modification) of rows. By default all filtering is done client side. (In generic Gora classes). Datastore implementations can decide if they install remote filters, when possible.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean filter(K key, T persistent)
      Filter the key and persistent.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

        readFields, write

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        boolean filter(K key,
             T persistent)
        Filter the key and persistent. Modification is possible.
        Parameters:
        key -
        persistent -
        Returns:
        true if the row is filtered out (excluded), false otherwise.
